id.description: Unique identifier for the tax rate

country.description: Country for which the tax rate is applicable

state.description: State or region to which the tax rate applies

postcode.description: Specific postcode to which the tax rate applies

city.description: City to which the tax rate applies

postcodes.description: List of postcodes where the tax rate applies

cities.description: List of cities where the tax rate applies

rate.description: Numeric value representing the tax rate percentage

name.description: Name or label for the tax rate

priority.description: Priority of the tax rate when calculating taxes

compound.description: Indicates if the tax rate is compound

shipping.description: Indicates if the tax rate applies to shipping costs

order.description: Order in which the tax rate should be applied

class.description: Classification of the tax rate (e.g., standard, reduced, zero)
